casebody.data: EUGENE ALAN BUSH, Jr., ET AL., PLAINTIFFS-PETITIONERS, v. IRVING RIKER, ET AL., DEFENDANTS-RESPONDENTS. Messrs. Wise, Wise, Wichmann & Merich for the petitioners. Messrs. Riher, Danzig, Marsh & Scherer, Mr. Howard F. Casselman, Messrs. Stout & O’Hagan and Mr. D. Joseph DeVito for the respondents. March 12, 1962. [NO OPINION]
